A general overview of fire extinguisher safety in the workplace.
Watch this short video that explains how to properly store and use fire extinguishers. Video privided by www.safetymemos.com
Fire extinguishers should be inspected quarterly, at least every 3 months.
Select the option that is not true:
Extinguishers should be charged at all times, with the gauge's needle pointing to green.
Extinguishers should be easily accessible with a minimum of 3 feet of clearance in all directions.
Fire extinguishers should be mounted on the wall at a height greater than 4 inches, and less than 60 inches.
Fire exinguishers should be hidden to prevent unauthorized personal from improperly using them.
